GSD.description:
mrp: introduce active flags to prevent UAF when applicant uninit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 755eb0879224ffc2a43de724554aeaf0e51e5a64. For more details please see the references link.
